profile.title: Developer
profile.WID: Currently enrolled as a Full Stack Development student at Lambda School I spend hours a day learning new technologies to add to my development stack.
profile.Heart: I love coding because anything I conceptualize I can build. Sure, I might struggle or need to learn something new to achieve the desired result, but this challenge is worth the payoff everytime.

profile.title: Content Creator
profile.WID: Currently I blog and tweet about my journey as aspiring web developer. Prior, as a member of the National Basketball Production Team, I curated social posts and edited video content.
profile.Heart: Telling stories is a core human value. In today's world of constant content and stimulation, being able to convey a story  creatively and clearly is an incredibly difficult challenge that I enjoy grappling with.

profile.title: Person
profile.WID: When I'm not coding you can find me trying to teach myself the banjo, watching whatever NY Sports team is in season or cooking a fun meal with friends.
tools: Rooting for the Jets, Mets, & Knicks Fan
